import React from 'react'; import './AboutMe.scss' // scroll animation import { Animator, ScrollContainer, ScrollPage, batch, Fade, FadeIn, Move, MoveIn, MoveOut, Sticky, StickyIn, ZoomIn } from "react-scroll-motion"; export default function AboutMe() { const FadeUp = batch(Fade(), Move(), Sticky()); return (

About me

Why Choose Me?

Front-end web developer with knowledge of ReactJs and ability to build complex applications with utmost efficiency. Strong professional and communication skills.

Here are a Few Highlights:

  • Frontend web development
  • Interactive Front End as per the design
  • Sass and scss lightweight and fast
  • JavaScript and Es6+ dominant of front-end
  • ReactJs one of the most popular technologies
  • Git for source control
); }
